projectBrief.Background: WorkIt is an easy-to-use digital application to manage field work order (WO) execution for assets across Distribution districts, regions, and Transmission grids
projectBrief.Intent of Project: The intent of the WorkIt project is to provide a digital application to manage field work order (WO) execution for assets across Distribution districts, regions, and Transmission grids. The application will provide a user-friendly interface to create, assign, and track WOs, and will integrate with other SCE systems to provide real-time status updates and asset information.
